menu.title: 'Fitness' Menu
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. A product for active and healthy people. This is an entirely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: 'Vegan' Menu
menu.descr: The 'Vegan' menu is a careful selection of ingredients: completely free of animal products, with milk made from almonds, oats, coconut, or buckwheat, and the right amount of protein from tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: 'Premium' Menu
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design but also high-quality dish preparation. Red fish, seafood, fruits â€“ a restaurant-style menu without going to a restaurant!
